parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission exists in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission for which the activity is being created for.

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: The label for the submission activity.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: The description of the submission activity.

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Specifies the a submission activity 'Type', which should indicate what type of data is included.

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Additional data that can be used by resources consuming the submission activity record (for example a Request bundle may render submission details based upon JSON content in the activity data).

parameters.parameter: {"Message":"Refund for <%= @values['Student First Name']%> <%= @values['Student Last Name']%> has been received"}

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp the submission is for.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content = {} content["Form"] = @form['Name'] content["Date"] = @submission['Submitted At'] content["url"] = "/#/kapps/services/requests/request/#{@submission['Id']}/review"
values = {} values["Member ID"] = @values['Members'] values["Type"] = "Request" values["Direction"] = "Inbound" values["Content"] = content.to_json
values.to_json %>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Origin ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the origin ID.

parameter.label: Parent ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the parent ID.

parameter.label: Billing Service Value
parameter.tooltip: GBMembers Billing Service call value (registerUser,billingInfo,)

parameter.label: Space slug
parameter.tooltip: Space slug for School

parameter.label: Billing Company
parameter.tooltip: Billing Company that the service will operate against.(eg, PaySmart)

parameter.label: JSON arguments
parameter.tooltip: A JSON structure containing all argument passed to the Billing Service

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission exists in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission for which the activity is being created for.

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: The label for the submission activity.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: The description of the submission activity.

parameters.parameter:
Refund to <%= @values['Student First Name'] %> <%= @values['Student Last Name']%> has failed.
Error Message: <%=JSON.parse(@results['Refund']['Result JSON'])['errorMessage']%>

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Specifies the a submission activity 'Type', which should indicate what type of data is included.

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Additional data that can be used by resources consuming the submission activity record (for example a Request bundle may render submission details based upon JSON content in the activity data).

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.label: Notification Template Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the notification template to use when sending this email

parameter.label: JSON Variables
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: services, queue, etc.)

parameter.label: Related Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Form Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form sending the notification (ex: work-order, cleaning, etc.)

parameter.label: Is Datastore
parameter.tooltip: If the Related Submission Id, or Form Slug is a datastore form.
